name: Search Tying Sub-Module
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows searching tied players for contraband, Confiscate items directly from inventory, Supports returning items after release, Pairs with main tying system, and Useful for police roleplay.

name: Tying Extras Sub-Module
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Adds gagging item to silence prisoners, Blindfolds limit vision while tied, Restricts entering vehicles when restrained, Works in tandem with main tying module, and Simple toggle options for admins.

name: Tying Dragging Sub-Module
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows dragging restrained players, Speed depends on weight of prisoner, Works with ties and handcuffs, Useful for moving captives discreetly, and Simple hold-to-drag mechanic.

name: Tying
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Rope items can restrain other players, Bound players cannot use weapons, Supports dragging with submodules, Blindfold and gag features available, and Encourages hostage scenarios.

name: Roleplay Rules
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Displays server rules in an in-game browser, Stores URL configuration for newcomers, Accessible from the help menu, Encourages players to read guidelines, and Simple and lightweight module.

name: Global Map
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Displays a world map for navigation, Flag controlled access for map tools, Useful for large open world maps, Players can mark locations, and Supports custom map images.

name: Limb Ripper
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows ripping limbs from ragdolls, Limbs become usable melee weapons, Gory visual effects for horror RP, Requires workshop models for limbs, and Optionally restrict to certain factions.

name: Car Options
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows players to lock or unlock personal vehicles, Engine toggle and headlight controls, Radio system with preset songs, Supports custom car horn sounds, and Quality-of-life options for car owners.

name: Help NPCs
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Provides information to new players, Can give basic starter items, Dialog tree explains server mechanics, Directs players to other NPC services, and Simple friendly conversation.

name: Taxi NPC
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Spawns taxi vehicles for hire, NPC teleports you to preset locations, Charges fee based on distance, Checks if player already owns a taxi, and Uses workshop vehicle models.

name: Roleplay NPCs
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows players to buy and sell properties, NPC manages rental durations and payments, Staff privileges for managing listings, Works with property submodule of NPCs, and Integrated showcase for property system.

name: Car Dealer
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Purchase vehicles from a dealer NPC, Return or repair owned vehicles for a fee, Custom paint jobs with configurable price, Garages store vehicles safely, and Integrates with driving addons.

name: Mechanic NPC
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Repairs damaged vehicles for a fee, Can customize vehicle paint jobs, Sells spare parts and upgrades, Works with car dealer garage system, and Uses simple NPC dialog.

name: Delivery NPC
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Offers parcel delivery side jobs, Random drop-off locations per mission, Pays players money on completion, NPC shows delivery progress via dialog, and Encourages exploration of the map.

name: Recruitment NPC
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Recruits players into factions, Provides introductory dialogue, Can assign starter gear upon enlistment, Supports multiple factions if configured, and Simple interaction with yes/no options.

name: Black Market NPC
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Sells illegal weapons and contraband, Limited stock with restock timers, Requires players to find secret location, Prices configurable via script, and Great for underground roleplay.

name: Roleplay NPCs
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Framework for custom roleplay NPCs, Supports dialogue trees and quests, Easy to add new NPC types, Used by submodules like mechanic or taxi, and Centralizes NPC scripts.

name: Radio Voice Chat
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Handheld radios enable voice chat, Players tune to channels via UI, Range based on radio quality, Supports push-to-talk or open mic, and Workshop model provides radio item.

name: Trading
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Secure trading window between two players, Both sides confirm before exchange, Supports item and money trades, Prevents dropping items during trade, and Logging to prevent scamming.

name: Gun License
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Maps vendor items to required permit items, Checks player inventory before allowing purchase, Notifies players when permit is missing, Works for selling items without restrictions, and Simple shared configuration table.

name: Entity Conversible
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows converting entities into interactable props, Players can pick up and move converted items, Useful for building barricades or scenes, Supports a variety of map objects, and Simple configuration table.

name: Animations
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Adds various /act commands for roleplay animations, Commands trigger animations from the EGM pack, Animations can be interrupted with movement, Supports both casual and combat poses, and Showcases dancing and gesture options.

name: ArcCW Attachments
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Creates ArcCW attachment items for weapons, Players equip attachments through inventory, Attachments modify weapon stats and appearance, Can disable if ArcCW is not present, and Supports custom attachment lists.

name: Chess and Droughts
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Spawn a chess board entity for matches, Supports both chess and checkers rules, Uses workshop models for board and pieces, Players take turns by interacting with pieces, and Great for downtime between events.

name: Languages
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players can learn new languages, Chat messages translated for speakers, Supports picking languages on char creation, Language table defines available options, and Useful for immersive roleplay.

name: Injuries System
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Adds limping and leg damage effects, Players require splints or medics to heal, Fall damage may break bones, Workshop models for crutches and casts, and Immersive injury system for realism.

name: Representative Voting
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players run as candidates for representative, Voting period toggled by admins, Tracks votes per player to avoid duplicates, Winners stored in CurrentRepresentatives, and Useful for community-driven governments.

name: Achievements
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Tracks kill and death milestones for multiple NPC types, Displays progress bars and achievement list in a menu, Unlocks rewards when requirements are met, Notifies players upon unlocking an achievement, and Character data stores achievement progress.

name: Crafting
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Craft items using recipes and ingredients, Supports multiple crafting benches, Time-based crafting with progress bar, Item blueprints define required skills, and Integrates with resource gathering mods.

name: Legislative Voting
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players propose and vote on new laws, Tracks votes per SteamID to prevent spam, Winning laws stored in LegislativeBoxLaws, Optional box entity for physical voting, and Brings politics to the server.

name: Leveling
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Character levels with experience points, XP awarded for various actions, Level determines unlocks and perks, Persistent across player sessions, and Supports manual adjustments by admins.

name: Improved Constructable Props
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows players to spawn constructable props, Prop placement follows resource cost system, Supports upgrading props into entities, Great for base building mechanics, and Integrated with toolgun options.

name: Drugs
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Custom drug cooking stations, Configurable timers for production, Drug items apply unique effects, Workshop content provides models, and Can expand with new drug recipes.

name: Cameras
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Adds static surveillance cameras around the map, Players can view camera feeds on monitors, Supports linking cameras to security factions, Workshop content provides camera models, and Integrates with the map for immersion.

name: Vending
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Placeable vending machine entities, Players withdraw earnings stored in the machine, Owners refill stock using items from inventory, Checks faction ownership before allowing actions, and Network messages handle opening UI and transactions.

name: Car Bomb
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Allows arming vehicles with timed car bombs, Bomb starts when engine is active and explodes after delay, Remote Explode action available for the bomber, Explosion removes the vehicle, and Uses Think hook to trigger detonation.

name: FOBs
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Forward operating bases spawn friendly NPCs, Capture zones that produce income, Defenders respawn at the FOB, Includes map markers and announcements, and Encourages strategic team play.

name: Code 99
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players trigger Code 99 alerts with network message, Sends name and position to authorized jobs, HUD displays hold progress and cooldown timer, Only certain factions can call or hear the alert, and Alerts multiple players simultaneously.

name: Control Points
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Control points captureable by factions, Spawn NPC entities that defend zones, Provides rewards for holding points, Shows status on HUD for participants, and Designed for PvP skirmishes.

name: Infection
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players can become infected from zombies, Progresses through multiple sickness stages, Treatment items cure or slow infection, Adds tension to survival gameplay, and Visual indicators show infection level.

name: Cassette Player
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Adds portable cassette players, Cassettes are collectible items with music, Players insert tapes to play audio, Playback heard by nearby players, and Useful for ambience or RP events.

name: Equip Slots
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Reworks inventory into equipment slots, Restricts slots based on level or rank, Defines max bag sizes for players, Provides better item organization, and Integrates with bonemerge outfits.

name: Clothing System
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Bonemerge system attaches clothing models to players, Handles gender specific models and bodygroups, Vendors sell outfits from configuration, Maintains equipped items across sessions, and Supports ties and other accessories.

name: Waypoints
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players can place personal waypoints, Visible markers appear on HUD, Waypoints shareable with squad mates, Commands to clear or rename markers, and Great for navigation during events.

name: Director Mode
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Spawn waves of enemies on demand, Balances difficulty based on player count, Designed after Left 4 Dead director, Allows admins to start dynamic events, and Great for cooperative scenarios.

name: Medals
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Award players with persistent medals, Medals displayed on character profiles, Staff permissions for giving or taking medals, Workshop models for medal icons, and Encourages achievement-based gameplay.

name: Events
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Config defines NPC events per map with spawn positions, Automatic timer spawns events when requirements met, notificationCallback sends staff and player messages, Admin commands to start events or remove NPCs, and Keeps track of active event NPCs using net vars.

name: Store Robbery
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Rob convenience stores for quick cash, Alarm triggers police notification, NPC clerk hands over money on success, Cooldown prevents repeated robbery, and Short, simple criminal activity.

name: WireTaps
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players can plant wiretap devices, Taps relay nearby voice chat, Hidden from victims unless found, Useful for undercover investigations, and Simple placement and removal.

name: Extraction
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players must reach extraction zones to escape, Timer counts down before evacuation, Positions configurable per map, Useful for raid style events, and Provides audio/visual cues.

name: Dynamic Food
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Craft and cook various food items, Food restores hunger stats, Workshop props for ingredients and dishes, Definitions file for adding new recipes, and Integrates with hunger/thirst systems.

name: ID System
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Creates digital ID during character creation, Stores information for police lookup, Pairs with serial numbers system, ID card item spawns with character, and Allows updates through government NPC.

name: Character Creation
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Includes developer mode toggle, Supports submodule for ID system, Client view table for custom panels, Character appearance customization, and Handles trait selections during creation.

name: Communication
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Placeable telephones that ring, Players dial numbers to call others, Server keeps a registry of phone numbers, Audio files for ringing and talking, and Stores phone placements for persistence.

name: Serial Numbers
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Assigns serial numbers to firearms, Police computer can search numbers, Helps track stolen weapons, Integrates with ID system, and Database logs ownership changes.

name: Traits
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Traits grant small passive bonuses, Configured via TraitsTable, Identifier used for cross-module hooks, Traits influence combat and crafting, and Players pick traits during character creation.

name: Animation Wheel
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Circular menu of common animations, Quick access via keybind, Client-side only module, Pre-set dance and gesture options, and Customizable categories for community animations.

name: Presidential Voting
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players vote for server president, Requires minimum playtime to participate, Stores ongoing election data, Winner gains special title or perks, and Announcements display live vote counts.

name: Character List
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Lists all characters on the server, Displays faction, class and play time, Search function for quick lookup, Useful for staff management, and Accessible from the F1 menu.

name: ID System
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Issues ID cards to new characters, Displays personal info in a document, Custom font for printed IDs, Integrates with character creation, and Future-proof for additional data.

name: Character Creation
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Overhauls the default character creation UI, Adds custom fields and validation, Supports ID system submodule, Workshop content for backgrounds, and Makes new characters more immersive.

name: Banking
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players can open up to three bank accounts for fees, Deposit, withdraw and transfer funds between accounts, Item bank storage with size based on VIP status, Transaction logs stored per account, and Anti-spam timers for banking actions.

name: Woodcutting
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Mine rocks for ore resources, Uses pickaxe tool with durability, Ores processed into crafting materials, Workshop props for rocks and tools, and Simple progression for gathering.

name: EFT Corpses
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players can loot items from corpses, Search radius limited by corpseMaxDist, Corpses use EFT-style models, Supports loot tables for random rewards, and Encourages risk vs reward gameplay.

name: Woodcutting
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Chop trees to gather wood logs, Uses axe tools with swinging animation, Logs processed into crafting materials, Workshop models for trees and stumps, and Simple skill progression system.

name: Lootables
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Spawn searchable containers around the map, Players loot random items from them, Containers have cooldowns before reuse, Supports customizing loot tables, and Encourages exploration for supplies.

name: Mobile Phones
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Players can pair phones to chat privately, Voice chat only works when partners are connected, Text chat via /phone command shows green prefix, Copy phone numbers to clipboard through UI, and Partner tracking stored using network vars.

name: Character Info
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Displays custom messages during char creation, Can show server rules or tips, Helps new players understand the setting, Works alongside other creation modules, and Easily editable text strings.

name: Fish
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Cast fishing rods to catch various fish, Huge list of collectible fish items, Randomized chance values per species, Workshop models add visual variety, and Registers fish as usable inventory items.

name: Lootables
author: Samael
desc: Provides features such as Random loot bags that drop items, Different rarity tiers of bags, Encourages exploration and scavenging, Items generated from configurable tables, and Simple use animation when opening.
